Author: tea-addicted-taemint
Text: Probably a combination of factors, including but not limited to:  -water retention from increased sodium/carb consumption (common in holiday season)  -use of a different scale that is calibrated differently than at home and its position on the floor -food weight from a full day of eating.  It would be very difficult to gain 10 lbs of fat in the span of 2.5 weeks, as you would have to eat at a very steep calorie surplus.   It's gonna be ok, op! I promise
